name: Infinite Ivories
description:
This is a submission to GMTK Game Jam 2022 withthe theme of "Roll of the Dice". The game is a turn-based RPG where you build your deck while traversing through the levels.

Gameplay Summary

The player will rely on their dice rolls to determine the strength of attacks/heals. The player can add multiple dices to increase strength/chances of the chosen action. The player can also build his own dice, adding faces to the dice that will pose advantages to the player, the enemy on the other hand will try to sabotage your dice and ultimately kill you.
